inclusion.criterion: stimulation cycles as will be described
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients will present for an appointment on approximately day 15-18 of her menstrual cycle
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If serum progesterone >3 ng/mL, and bHCG < 5 mIU/mL, the patient will begin 450 IU of daily injectable gonadotropins: 150 IU of hMG (Menopur®, Ferring Pharmaceuticals) and 300 IU of recombinant FSH (rFSH) (Gonal F®,Serono; or Follitropin beta (Follistim®, Organo)).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She will present for follicular monitoring ultrasound and serum blood tests on stimulation day 3-4, 5-6, and 7-8-~15.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Gonadotropin releasing hormone (GnRH) antagonist (Ganirelix, Organon; and cetrorelix, Serono) will be started daily once either (1) serum estradiol level reaches > 400 pg/mL, lead follicle size > 13mm, or (2) on stimulation day 6.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Once patient are ready for ovulation trigger as determine by physician, 5-10,000 units of human chorionic gonadotropin (Novarel®: Ferring Pharmaceuticals; or Pregnyl®: Schering-Plough) will be administered.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: A patient's trigger shot could be changed to include a GnRH agonist (i.e Luprolide acetate 40 IU) if deemed clinically necessary for ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome prevention.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: On the morning after hCG administration, patients' blood will be drawn and serum analyzed for hCG concentration to ensure adequate absorption (mean time 8-10 hours).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Transvaginal oocyte retrieval will be performed 35 to 37 hours after hCG trigger.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All metaphase II oocytes will be fertilized with intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI) or IVF per patient request and laboratory protocol.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Embryos will be cultured to the blastocyst stage and vitrified on day 5-7.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who will be undergoing controlled ovarian stimulation and who have a diagnosis of diminished ovarian reserve
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Anovulatory or oligo-ovulatory (<6 ovulation per year)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Exposure to cytotoxic or pelvic irradiation
exclusion.label: triggers
